Package perfcenter.simulator.metric

This package contains the classes that provide metric hierarchy for collecting observed values during simulation.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfInterval
    Given a set of data points, this class helps to calculate confidence intervals for that set.
    DiscreteSampleAverageMetric
    This class of hierarchy is used to manage values of a metric which is averaged in a discrete way.
    ManuallyComputedMetric
    This class is used for those metrics, which are computed from other performance counters.
    MetricSim
    Contains the skeleton methods and variables for concrete implementation of MetricSim classes.
    SummationMetric
    This class is just a wrapper around a summation variable, like total number of requests served.
    TimeAverageMetric
    This class of hierarchy is used to manage values of a metric which is averaged in a continuous way.

Package perfcenter.simulator.metric Description

This package contains the classes that provide metric hierarchy for collecting observed values during simulation.

The package abstracts the collection and processing of value from the main simulation logic. Any post-processing of the collected values can be done in this package, making it a central place for any kind of data-processing and post-processing.
